reviews.review: The best superhero movie ever made. A plot so spectacularly developed while the inclusion of so many characters successfully in the movie complimented the rythm and flow of the jam packed action throughout the movie. Never a boring moment. This movie did justice to the nearly decade long build up of Thanos's arrival.

This movie is so good.  The rewatchability factor of this movie is so good that you could watch it ten times in a row and you would still love it.   This movie is so well made and it is so much fun.  The action and comedy is on point.  One of the best movies in the entire MCU.
Best. Film. Of 2018, shocked me in a good way.

One of the best superhero films ever made, this film took our expectations and completely turned them upside down, by "killing off" the characters we least expected to go. Featuring fantastic direction from the Russo Brothers that balances each character perfectly giving the audience just the right amount of time with each hero. Josh Brolin delivers one of his best performances, and quite possibly the best performance in the film, giving Thanos true motivation that makes him a true villain you love to hate. (just as much as Heath Ledger's Joker) The performances from our heroes are also fantastic and it's hard to single out a select few as they all do a fantastic job. I love this film just as much as the first and I'm truly stunned to see where they're going with the franchise from here on out. Cause as fans we're in the Endgame now.
Shocking, and intense. Thanos makes for one of the best villains of all time.
I can't describe how AMAZING this movie is
It was absolutley awesome from start to finish! Highly recommend

My personal favorite of the MCU is action packed, fast paced and without a doubt my favorite. Thanos of course makes a great villain and him succeeding in his plan came as a suprise and set it up for a great next movie Endgame my second favorite of the MCU movies. It was sad but there was still hope a great combination.
Theres was never a moment where you were bored, the action, story, and pacing were all on point
